name: Ernest L. McKNIGHT, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent

parties: Ernest L. McKNIGHT, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of December, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
57 A.3d 643
Ernest L. McKNIGHT, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.
No. 183 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 17, 2012.
